cards.title: Stinking Cloud
cards.description: Create a 20-ft sphere of nauseating gas, heavily obscuring the area. Creatures inside must make a con save or spend their turn retching. Wind can disperse it in 1-4 rounds.

art_versions.prompt: Fantasy artwork of the spell 'Stinking Cloud', from a tabletop RPG. Depict a magical scene representing a level 3 Conjuration spell. Include dramatic lighting, detailed environment, and cinematic style. Focus on the spell's effects: Create a 20-ft sphere of nauseating gas, heavily obscuring the area. Creatures inside must make a con save or spend their turn retching. Wind can disperse it in 1-4 rounds.. twilight sky Use a painterly look inspired by ArtStation and Wizards of the Coast illustrations.

cards.title: Vampiric Touch
cards.description: "Siphon life force with Shadow Touch: 3d6 necrotic damage to target, heal for half damage dealt. Repeat attack each turn."

art_versions.prompt: Fantasy artwork of the spell 'Vampiric Touch', from a tabletop RPG. Depict a magical scene representing a level 3 Necromancy spell. Include dramatic lighting, detailed environment, and cinematic style. Focus on the spell's effects: "Siphon life force with Shadow Touch: 3d6 necrotic damage to target, heal for half damage dealt. Repeat attack each turn.". twilight sky Use a painterly look inspired by ArtStation and Wizards of the Coast illustrations.
